ingredients: 1  large watermelon, 1  cantaloupe, halved and seeded, 1  honeydew melon, halved and seeded, 2 (15 ounce) cans mandarin oranges, drained, 2 (20 ounce) cans pineapple chunks, drained, 2 cups halved fresh strawberries, 2 cups seedless grapes ,   +   1/2 cup water,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons grated lemon zest
nutrition: Total Fat 1g 1%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 23mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 45g 17%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 40g, Protein 3g, Vitamin C 75mg 377%, Calcium 41mg 3%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 683mg 15%
